mapper.select: select * from reply order by no desc
select reply.*, (select member.profile_img from member where member.id = reply.writer) as profile_img from reply where reply.boardNo = #{boardType} order by reply.no desc
select count(*) as countReply from reply where reply.boardNo = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(no, boardNo, writer, content, regdate) values(seq_reply_no.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{writer}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update reply set content=#{content} where no = #{no}
